# Grains Docs

## Advanced features

- [External tasks and grains](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/external-tasks-and-grains.md): Learn about external tasks and grains in .NET Orleans.
- [Interceptors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/interceptors.md): Learn about grain call filters in .NET Orleans.
- [GrainServices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grainservices.md): Learn how to create a GrainService in .NET Orleans.
- [Stateless worker grains](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/stateless-worker-grains.md): Learn how to use stateless worker grains in .NET Orleans.
- [Transactions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/transactions.md): Learn how to use transactions in .NET Orleans.
- [One-way requests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/oneway.md): Learn about one-way requests in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain lifecycle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grain-lifecycle.md): Learn about grain lifecycles in .NET Orleans.

## Grain placement

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grain-placement.md): Learn about grain placement in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain placement filtering](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grain-placement-filtering.md): Learn about grain placement filtering in Microsoft Orleans.

## Grains

- [Develop grains](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/index.md): Learn how to develop a grain in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain references](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grain-references.md): Learn about grain references in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain identity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grain-identity.md): Learn about grain identities in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain extensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/grain-extensions.md): Learn how to extend an Orleans Grain.
- [Timers and reminders](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/timers-and-reminders.md): Learn how to use timers and reminders in .NET Orleans.
- [Observers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/observers.md): Learn about observers in .NET Orleans.
- [Cancellation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/cancellation-tokens.md): Learn how to implement cooperative cancellation in Orleans grain methods.
- [Request scheduling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/request-scheduling.md): Learn about request scheduling in .NET Orleans.
- [Request context](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/request-context.md): Learn about request context in .NET Orleans.
- [Code generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/grains/code-generation.md): Learn how to use code generation in .NET Orleans.
